downloadDescription: The SQL Server 2016 Training Kit is a great resource for developers, trainers, consultants and evangelists who need to understand the key improvements introduced in SQL Server 2016. It contains a rich set of presentations, demos, hands-on labs, and videos that are perfect for your self-paced learning or for conducting your own training event and gain valuable insights into the new capabilities.
detailsSection: The SQL Server 2016 Training Kit is a great resource for developers, trainers, consultants and evangelists who need to understand the key improvements introduced in SQL Server 2016. It contains a rich set of presentations, demos, hands-on labs, and videos that are perfect for your self-paced learning or for conducting your own training event and gain valuable insights into the new capabilities in SQL server 2016.
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1, Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2016, 
SQL Server 2016
installInstructionSection: Download and extract the training kit package. Navigate to the specified folder and launch the training kit .html file to browse the content.
